Urban Cookware
Tell Me More

About Us

Urban Cookware is a small family run business providing quality cookware to brighten up your kitchen.
Our products are designed to bring colour and style to your cooking experience.

Products

Kitchen Utensil Set

Premium 6-piece Nylon Kitchen Utensil Set, 6 Cooking Utensils with Utensil Holder. These stylish colours will add a touch of class to your kitchen or make a perfect gift for someone special as it comes with a beautifully designed gift box:

Utensil Set & Holder
Flexible Turner
Ladle
Slotted Spatula
Slotted Spoon
Solid Spoon
Spaghetti Server
Previous Next





INNOVATIVE ERGONOMIC DESIGN

These cooking tools are strong and flexible with a comfortable soft grip, perfect for all your culinary needs whether you're cooking up a sumptuous steak, whipping up a stir fry, flipping pancakes, baking tasty treats or serving up spaghetti.

NON-SCRATCH and NO MESS

The Nylon finish and smooth edges of these quality utensils protects your pans from scratch marks. The elevated handles have been specially designed to enable the functional end of the utensil to rest above the worktop reducing the mess and stains left on your kitchen surfaces.

BPA-FREE, FDA GRADE KITCHEN TOOLS

There are no small holes or gaps for bacteria to enter which makes these utensils the hygienic choice for a healthy kitchen.

EASY TO CLEAN, NON-STICK and DISHWASHER SAFE

These premium cooking utensils are non-stick and durable, and can be washed either by hand or safely put through the dishwasher.
